attributes.action: Close the loophole that allows politicians to claim vast sums of money for second homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is alleged in the Sunday Mail 23 September 2007 that two politicians are claiming forty four thousand pounds towards a second home, due to a loophole in the law. I would ask the Prime Minister to see that this loophole is closed. A great many British citizens are having to survive on wages/income of ten to twelve thousand pounds a year and still have to pay tax. Is it fair that this tax is used for this purpose?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
